website_summaries.verdict: Playing with Marvel heroes is much more fun when you have a bad guy to defeat, and this durable, well-painted, and cartoon-accurate baddie duo is a steal.
pros: Includes villainous Venom and Carnage figures
cons: Limited articulation at shoulders and legs

customer_reviews.title: As good as a bad guy could be I guess
customer_reviews.text: Venom's head has popped off repeatedly since my son opened it on Christmas, but it easily pops back on. Otherwise as to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Well Made Toys.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these. They are we'll made and just as Pictured, although the photo makes Carnage look taller than venom, but he is not. They look properly proportioned to one another. The packaging is awesome, and I couldn't bring myself to throw away the cool art on the back card.
customer_reviews.author: Tracking Packages

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with cardboard back cleanly torn away. Plastic wasn't damaged but feels like i bought a used toy. Now i have to tape it up because its a gift. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cate N.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Worked great as cake toppers! Bday boy was super excited to have bad guys on his cake. I feel like this was a great value for two toys.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great set-Non moveable tongue!
customer_reviews.text: My son specifically wanted this size venom without the moveable tongue. He saw the moveable tongue one at Target and really wanted it except for that feature. This one does not have the lever on the back with the moveable tongue so he is extremely happy. The Carnage is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my five-year-old son and my 2 year old son actually loved it more. Great purchase if your kids like Venom and Carnage. But one thing I don't like is that Venom head can comes off, I'm constantly putting the head back on when they're playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vample

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Venom is very high quality, well made. My son's newest favorite BAD GUY!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Martin

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Sizing is subjective but they're perfect for my 2 year old. Best thing is that they both stand upright without any hassle; I've gone through so many random toys that won't stand upright and the kid gets pretty upset about that.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for a friend
customer_reviews.text: My friends son really wanted this item so I ordered it because my friend was having financial problems. His son loved it and thought the world of his father for having gotten it for him.
customer_reviews.author: John Ames

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: She the package arrived I unboxed it and the actual figures pack was opened all down the bottom no damage was done to the figures though so I just taped it shut and wrapped it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Package Arrived Opened
customer_reviews.text: The toys themselves are nice, but this is intended as a gift for a little boy. The fact that it came already opened is crazy to me since this is supposed to be "New".
customer_reviews.author: Boris Yeltsin

customer_reviews.title: Fun to look at
customer_reviews.text: My son (age 7) was a little disappointed in these 2 characters. He was hoping for more articulation. But I think the value is pretty good and they added to his collection of heros/villians to play with.
customer_reviews.author: PNW-Mom

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved venom has not picked up the ref guy yet
customer_reviews.text: The price of the 2 toys together were high because all I wanted was the black venom doll my grand son asked Santa for it and has not put it down I wish I just could have brought the black venom doll
customer_reviews.author: phylis carreiro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good detail
customer_reviews.text: These are good toys. Its easy to get them to stand on a level surface. They are not likely to break and are made well. The detailing is good for this price range. Fit my son's Spiderman Mega City playset perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not New! It’s used
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in November and just now taking it out of amazon box to wrap for Christmas, and just noticing the box looks like the person I bought it from used it and put it back In The box, the whole thing is broken and open. Not worth the money. I bought it under new. And it is used. Disappointed. Should have taken the whole thing out when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: I’m no superhero or action figure expert but my kid loved these. He loves all things superheroes and was excited to get some villains to add to his collection. The toys seem comparable to other action figures he has.
customer_reviews.author: Dan h.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! W o r t h . I t
customer_reviews.text: I actually work at a Amazon warehouse and came across this in person. Instanctly thought, “ Yup, worth it. “ So after work, I got online and order it and came in brand new! Little brother loves it!
customer_reviews.author: calcey earl yazzie

customer_reviews.title: Tinier than I thought
customer_reviews.text: All of my sons action figures as 2-3 times bigger than these. It's a bit too pricey for the size and how detachable the heads are.
customer_reviews.author: Chavela Moonlight

customer_reviews.title: Works For my need
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than what they look in the picture. They will work for my need but not spectacular. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Sands

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves Venom and when he got these for Christmas he was over the moon. So far they are holding up great and look like they will last a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Hicken Clan

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loved them but was a bit pricey being how small the action figures are. Other than that he loved them and I’m sure he did not mind the size of them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice figures for the spider man characters
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and enough flexibility to be a nice action figure. No extra little pieces to lose as soon as you open the package. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Dunkerley

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them but, had to glue smaller pieces in place
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them! Had to glue the smaller pieces in place (Venom's head and Carnage's wing things). They are both removable, which I didn't like. I made it work.
customer_reviews.author: C.T. Blooms

customer_reviews.title: trouble finding these toys in Kans-
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a good friends grandson for his birthday as she could not find them in the stores here in Overland Park, KS. The little boy was very happy with then!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn J. Oothout

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The Venom figure is sturdy and well painted, the Carnage figure, not so much. There's not many points of articulation on either figure, so they're not really posable. My kids love them so it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: My son is in love with these and they’re very well made action figures!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cool but stiff
customer_reviews.text: These do not move at the elbow or knee. The head on venom pops off way too easy it’s already lost. But kids still think they’re cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dkw

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find in stores!
customer_reviews.text: Fun set of figures that I haven't seen in any stores. The black figure, Venom is well made but the red figure, Carnage not as much. The black pieces that attach to the back of this figure come off way to easily, I am sure they will get lost easily unless I glue them on.
customer_reviews.author: KelleyB

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this toy set. I havent seen him smile so big ever. Great toys hope they keep coming out with fun venom and other characters.
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons' for Christmas. They both love to play with them. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Happy gift.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this as a gift for my grandson which had a great time with it. Was just the right size and durable.... Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Venom!
customer_reviews.text: My son find them to be great. He can pull pieces apart and put it back together. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look like trash
customer_reviews.text: The sculpt on these is terrible. They just look cheap. I have lots of other marvel legends six inch dolls and they are really cool these are NOT the same quality of toy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: The carnage character is minimally detailed but a win in value non the less.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality

customer_reviews.title: Great toy

customer_reviews.title: Great, realistic action figures

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Nice action figures!! My kiddo was super happy. Good size too!

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a return product

customer_reviews.title: My son Loves These

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking figurines, just to look at
customer_reviews.text: The figurines look awesome! Just upset that Venom’s head fell off once my son started to play with it. So maybe if you want to collect great, for a kid to play not so great for Venom

customer_reviews.title: Youth approved

customer_reviews.title: Venom rules
customer_reviews.text: So happy I was able to find exactly what my nephew wanted I’m tickled pink

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The venom heads comes off and the carnage lasted mabey a couple weeks with me 4 year old it okay

customer_reviews.title: Happy 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Carnage's spines easily detach and be venoms head pops off and on easily.

customer_reviews.title: Toy Package already opened
customer_reviews.text: The toys seem like they are in decent shape but when it arrived, the toy packaging was already ripped off like it had been opened already. In order to give this to our son for his birthday, we will have to repackage it.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a Xmas gift for my 4 year old grandson and he was excited to see it. Can’t really give a 5 for durability just yet.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase

customer_reviews.title: five star

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Fun set

customer_reviews.title: It was used
customer_reviews.text: This was used and as far as I saw on the ad, it was not listed as used. It was bought as a Christmas present so I'm very disappointed that it's in an open box

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved them. Had them out of package and playing in less than 30 minutes. Chose these over other gifts

product_meta.title: Marvel Venom, Venom and Carnage Action Figures, Collectible Action Figure Toys- 6 inch, 2 Pack
product_meta.description:
Size:-The Marvel Universe features heroes, villains, and stories that are larger than life. Marvel has created some of the world's most iconic characters through stories where incredible Super Heroes battle powerful foes with the fate of the universe in the balance. Create your own epic Marvel adventures with figures, vehicles, and role-play toys. 

A sinister symbiote, Venom seeks out evil and power, destroying anything in his path. He turns its human host into a sinister menace with no remorse for wrongdoings. 

A similarly sinister villain, Carnage uses his brute strength and otherworldly superpowers to combat his foes. Carnage proves to be the ultimate enemy for Spider-Man and Venom. Imagine epic battles of good versus evil. 

Imagine these noteworthy bad guys threatening justice with the Venom and Carnage 6-inch scale figure 2-pack, including character-inspired accessory. 

Each 6 inch figure features multiple points of articulation and entertainment-inspired design. 

Kids and adult Marvel fans can start a legendary collection of comic- and movie-based Marvel characters (each sold separately).
feature_bullets: Imagine combat action with two iconic villain figures
Each figure has multiple points of articulation and entertainment-inspired design
Includes: 2 figures and accessory. Ages 4 and up.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars605 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
